select MS_VESSEL_SECTION_ID, VESSEL_SECTION_NAME, DELETE_FLAG, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS
from MS_VESSEL_SECTION where DELETE_FLAG = 0 order by MS_VESSEL_SECTION_ID

select MS_VESSEL_SECTION_ID, VESSEL_SECTION_NAME, DELETE_FLAG, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS
from MS_VESSEL_SECTION where MS_VESSEL_SECTION_ID = :MS_VESSEL_SECTION_ID

INSERT INTO MS_VESSEL_SECTION( MS_VESSEL_SECTION_ID, VESSEL_SECTION_NAME, DELETE_FLAG, RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID, TS ) VALUES( :MS_VESSEL_SECTION_ID, :VESSEL_SECTION_NAME, :DELETE_FLAG, :RENEW_DATE, :RENEW_USER_ID, :TS )

UPDATE MS_VESSEL_SECTION SET VESSEL_SECTION_NAME = :VESSEL_SECTION_NAME, DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE, RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID, TS = :TS
where MS_VESSEL_SECTION_ID = :MS_VESSEL_SECTION_ID and TS = :TS
